S.FORM: paqasaw (tubunanay) ta' ku' kinhabgan su' (ni' Yawi') .
paqasaw (tobonanay) ta' ko' kinhabgan so' (ni' Yawi') .
lawkah su' ka papasibaq ga, Yawi':
lawkah so' ka papasibaq ga, Yawi':

cugabiyan ga makilux ru masiburus 'i' Yawi', kumal ku' sinsang mha nababalaiq 'i' mhngaw i' imuwaag. asiki talatalan cu' qutux cu' riax. kahi 'i' aqih 'i' musa' 'i' matiq 'i' kisa, lumalung cu' mha kalaw ta' ku' papasibaq mha mhngaway ci' cu' qutux cu' riax 'i' kisa.

cogabiyan ga makilox ro masiboros 'i' Yawi', komal ko' sinsang mha nababalaiq 'i' mhngaw i' imowaag. asiki talatalan co' qotox co' riax. kahi 'i' aqih 'i' mosa' 'i' matiq 'i' kisa, lomalong co' mha kalaw ta' ko' papasibaq mha mhngaway ci' co' qotox co' riax 'i' kisa.
S.TRANSL: 亞衛一昨晚發燒、腹瀉，醫生囑咐在家休息，要觀察一天，所以今日無法到校上課，擬向老師請假一天。

S.FORM: magalpug cu' buwating ru mapusal cu' rusa' cu' riax
magalpog co' bowating ro maposal co' rosa' co' riax
gabagan ka tikay ga mumuwa cu' qutux cu' gaghap na' bangbung. qamisan ka tikay ga lumamu cu' payux cu' buway na' pinumuwa.
gabagan ka tikay ga momowa co' qotox co' gaghap na' bangbong. qamisan ka tikay ga lomamo co' payox co' boway na' pinomowa.
S.TRANSL: 春種一粒粟，秋收萬顆子。

S.FORM: lalingay kahbag ga ukas a' hariq cku' claq la kamasqayyungan kahbag ku' papatawwaw.
lalingay kahbag ga okas a' hariq cko' claq la kamasqayyongan kahbag ko' papatawwaw.
S.TRANSL: 四海無閒田，農夫猶餓死。

S.FORM: mamati a' wagi' ga mahangal cu' pakarux na rinuwang ga masikura kahbag cku' rawq.
mamati a' wagi' ga mahangal co' pakarox na rinowang ga masikora kahbag cko' rawq.
S.TRANSL: 鋤禾日當午，汗滴禾下土。

S.FORM: ima' ku' baq cku' salaman na' mami' mataqaqutux cu' buwax na' mamai' ga kinawbkan kahbag.
ima' ko' baq cko' salaman na' mami' mataqaqotox co' bowax na' mamai' ga kinawbkan kahbag.
S.TRANSL: 誰知盤中飧，粒粒皆辛苦。

S.FORM: qutux cu' riax, kiya' 'i' mabahuq 'i' yaya'. kiya' 'i' maganaw i' bih ni' yaya' 'i' Yawi'. magautux 'i' Yawi' ini panabaq ru kuciwan niya' ku' sasukuan cu' babahug ni' yaya'. masihwag i' rawq ku' babahuq ru maimag kina rawq la.

qotox co' riax, kiya' 'i' mabahoq 'i' yaya'. kiya' 'i' maganaw i' bih ni' yaya' 'i' Yawi'. magaotox 'i' Yawi' ini panabaq ro kociwan niya' ko' sasokoan co' babahog ni' yaya'. masihwag i' rawq ko' babahoq ro maimag kina rawq la.
S.TRANSL: 一天，媽媽在洗衣服，亞衛一在旁邊玩。淘氣的亞衛一不小心一腳把媽媽的肥皂盒碰翻，肥皂掉在地上沾了許多泥。

S.FORM: "Yawi'! nanuwan qutux kani ku' pingautux su'. siuragan su' ku' babahuq mu. nabibuwi tikay 'i' musa' i' lulyung 'i' qumuwax ku' babahuq. masang 'i' yaya' mha." Yawi'! nabibuwi tikay lamu ku' babahuq ka sinihuwag si' rawq.

"Yawi'! nanowan qotox kani ko' pingaotox so'. sioragan so' ko' babahoq mo. nabibowi tikay 'i' mosa' i' lolyong 'i' qomowax ko' babahoq. masang 'i' yaya' mha." Yawi'! nabibowi tikay lamo ko' babahoq ka sinihowag si' rawq.
S.TRANSL: 「亞衛一，看你這個淘氣鬼，把我的肥皂都弄髒了，快到河邊把肥皂洗乾淨。」媽媽生氣地說。

S.FORM: lumanglung ru maqut 'i' Yawi':"aya', maurag la ku' babahuq ru hahacuwalun ti qumuwax la? "
lomanglong ro maqot 'i' Yawi':"aya', maorag la ko' babahoq ro hahacowalon ti qomowax la? "
S.TRANSL: 亞衛一把掉在地上的肥皂撿起來，想了想問道：「媽媽，肥皂髒了用什麼東西能洗乾淨呢？」

S.FORM: capaang na' tapaputing cubalay na' makibaq cu' kai' na' matu'uwal! ru yani cu' na baq 'i' matiq! babaw niya' ga iqat paqabaq 'i' makibaq cu' kai' na' matu'uwal la. yani masiki' i' runi ku' kai' na' matu'uwal la. micuwa' mu ka aqih 'i' kuwing nanaq ka humikum cu' riax.

capaang na' tapapoting cobalay na' makibaq co' kai' na' mato'owal! ro yani co' na baq 'i' matiq! babaw niya' ga iqat paqabaq 'i' makibaq co' kai' na' mato'owal la. yani masiki' i' roni ko' kai' na' mato'owal la. micowa' mo ka aqih 'i' kowing nanaq ka homikom co' riax.
S.TRANSL: 我的最後一堂泰雅語課！…我只是剛剛學會寫字！今後永遠也學不到泰雅語！泰雅語就到此為止了！

S.FORM: aqih i kuwing nanaq ka ini usa' 'i' matiq ru musa' kumyum cu' libu' na' kabahniq. musa' i' lulyuing 'i' maganaw cu' qusiya'.
aqih i kowing nanaq ka ini osa' 'i' matiq ro mosa' komyom co' libo' na' kabahniq. mosa' i' lolyoing 'i' maganaw co' qosiya'.
S.TRANSL: 我現在是多麼悔恨自己蹉跎光陰啊！悔恨自己從前蹺課去掏鳥窩，去河邊戲水！

S.FORM: tiku ruwas mu ka yani ga,ruwas na' kai' na' matu'uwal. ruwas ka capaang na' balaiq na' sinnubilan cu' kai' na' nanabakis cunga'. sawni ga sipanga' mu ru sumsasuwak mu gi sumiaimuliq mu cubalay. gumlaluwag cu' lawwiy ru asi mu ga capaang na' rawing mu lawwiy ru lingisan mu lawwiy 'i' malax.

tiko rowas mo ka yani ga,rowas na' kai' na' mato'owal. rowas ka capaang na' balaiq na' sinnobilan co' kai' na' nanabakis conga'. sawni ga sipanga' mo ro somsasowak mo gi somiaimoliq mo cobalay. gomlalowag co' lawwiy ro asi mo ga capaang na' rawing mo lawwiy ro lingisan mo lawwiy 'i' malax.
S.TRANSL: 我的那些書，我的泰雅語課本，我的神聖的歷史書，剛才背在身上還覺得那麼討厭，那麼沉重，現在卻像老朋友一樣，讓我難捨難分。

S.FORM: ru kiya' na' 'i' Baay wiy. 'i' lungulungun mu ga mausa' 'i' hiya' la, iqat mu tatalan 'i' hiya' la.ungingan mi la ku' kinasang niya' ru tinuting niya'.
ro kiya' na' 'i' Baay wiy. 'i' longolongon mo ga maosa' 'i' hiya' la, iqat mo tatalan 'i' hiya' la.ongingan mi la ko' kinasang niya' ro tinoting niya'.
S.TRANSL: 還有Baay先生。一想到他就要走了，再也見不到了，我就忘記了以前的處懲和挨打。

S.FORM: Taiwan ga, yani a' capaang na' kakian mu. kii' lumanglung su' mha micuwa' ka manananaq. bali' ini baqi' cu' humibug ci' Gipun, Sinco Cencicwan ka lulyung ka tikay na' tinqalangan. tiku pinkibaqan ga, Taiwan ga capaang na' kinhabgan mu. kahi 'i' lumanglung cu mha Taiwan ga yani capaang na' kakian mu.

Taiwan ga, yani a' capaang na' kakian mo. kii' lomanglong so' mha micowa' ka manananaq. bali' ini baqi' co' homibog ci' Gipon, Sinco Cencicwan ka lolyong ka tikay na' tinqalangan. tiko pinkibaqan ga, Taiwan ga capaang na' kinhabgan mo. kahi 'i' lomanglong co mha Taiwan ga yani capaang na' kakian mo.
S.TRANSL: 臺灣是我的故鄉之一，或許你會覺得奇怪；雖然我是出生在日本信州千曲川河畔的一個小農村，但是在學問的領域裡，臺灣卻是我的誕生地。所以我說臺灣是我的故鄉。

S.FORM: maki runi ga maglug cu cku' capaang na' rawing mu ka yencumingcu ru masibalaiq cami cubalay la. makbabaq cami 'i' makal kinha ga asiga mabuwinah lawwiy cku' capaang na' kakian mu.
maki roni ga maglog co cko' capaang na' rawing mo ka yencomingco ro masibalaiq cami cobalay la. makbabaq cami 'i' makal kinha ga asiga mabowinah lawwiy cko' capaang na' kakian mo.
S.TRANSL: 在這裡，我和我的研究對象—原住民成為好朋友，能和他們談話，就像回到自己的故鄉一樣。 作者： 宮本延人

S.FORM: yani cubalay a' magbatunux na' tawyu' na' pati'. maqas ru maqas
yani cobalay a' magbatonox na' tawyo' na' pati'. maqas ro maqas
S.TRANSL: 是我們美麗的稻穗 歡喜呀歡喜

S.FORM: nabuwibuwi tikay 'i' pausa' cu' pinatiq ku' kiya' i' tatuhi i'
nabowibowi tikay 'i' paosa' co' pinatiq ko' kiya' i' tatohi i'
S.TRANSL: 趕快寫信給遠在南洋的兄弟一起來慶賀」

S.FORM: Nayang ka qaqumisuwan ru sasuway. magalgay ti' tumubun 'i' tumurahug 'i' nha.
Nayang ka qaqomisowan ro sasoway. magalgay ti' tomobon 'i' tomorahog 'i' nha.
S.TRANSL: 口述/莫那能 整理/李疾

S.FORM: qutux. ululaqi' pakibaqi' ku' pinsibaq mu. kaa' ungii' cubalay ku' pinsibaq mu i' cimu.
qotox. ololaqi' pakibaqi' ko' pinsibaq mo. kaa' ongii' cobalay ko' pinsibaq mo i' cimo.
S.TRANSL: 1.年輕人哪，要學習我的教導，不可忘記我給你的指示。

S.FORM: usaying. pungi' ku' kai' ka pinsibaq na' nanabakis. naki si' baqun ku' capaang na' pinsibaqan.
osaying. pongi' ko' kai' ka pinsibaq na' nanabakis. naki si' baqon ko' capaang na' pinsibaqan.
S.TRANSL: 2.要聽明智的訓言，明白它的意義。

S.FORM: tugal (tuu'). uwal ga, mahag cu' pinsibaqan. kumyum cu' babaqun.
togal (too'). owal ga, mahag co' pinsibaqan. komyom co' babaqon.
S.TRANSL: 3.是的，要追求知識；要尋求領悟。

S.FORM: sapat (spat). karangi 'i' maknamatimati 'i' kumyum cu' pila' ru mangagu' 'i' kumyum cu' balaiq na' wawwaw.
sapat (spat). karangi 'i' maknamatimati 'i' komyom co' pila' ro mangago' 'i' komyom co' balaiq na' wawwaw.
S.TRANSL: 4.要像尋求銀子一樣熱心，像搜索寶藏一樣認真。

S.FORM: imagal (ima'). muwani la ga, babaqun su' mha nanuwan ku' tumurahug cku' Utux. babaqun su' mha nanuwan ku' makababaq cku' Utux.
imagal (ima'). mowani la ga, babaqon so' mha nanowan ko' tomorahog cko' Utox. babaqon so' mha nanowan ko' makababaq cko' Utox.
S.TRANSL: 5.這樣，你就會領悟甚麼是敬畏上主，明白甚麼是認識上帝。

S.FORM: mamatu. biniq na' Utux ku' balaiq a' tunux minukahul cku' Yaba' Utux kaal ku' pinkibaqan ru linanglung.
mamato. biniq na' Utox ko' balaiq a' tonox minokahol cko' Yaba' Utox kaal ko' pinkibaqan ro linanglong.
S.TRANSL: 6.因為，賜智慧的是上主，知識和悟性都是從他來的。

S.FORM: mapitu. rumag cku' ini kahmut na' cuquliq 'i' hiya'. malahang cku' masa'su' ka cuquliq.
mapito. romag cko' ini kahmot na' coqoliq 'i' hiya'. malahang cko' masa'so' ka coqoliq.
S.TRANSL: 7.他幫助正直的人，保護誠實的人。

S.FORM: mamaspat. rumag cku' ini qihhag cu' cuquliq. malahang cku' ini gilamulamu 'i' lumanglung ka cuquliq.
mamaspat. romag cko' ini qihhag co' coqoliq. malahang cko' ini gilamolamo 'i' lomanglong ka coqoliq.
S.TRANSL: 8.他幫助待人公道的人，衛護對他忠誠的人。

S.FORM: mamaqisug. pungan su' ku' kai' mu ga babaqun su' ku' humicucwa ku' masa'su', ini qihhag ru ini kahmut. babaqun su' cu' nanuwan ku' capaang na' mausa' si' kabalayun.
mamaqisog. pongan so' ko' kai' mo ga babaqon so' ko' homicocwa ko' masa'so', ini qihhag ro ini kahmot. babaqon so' co' nanowan ko' capaang na' maosa' si' kabalayon.
S.TRANSL: 9.你若聽從我，就會知道甚麼是誠實、公平、正直，知道甚麼是你們應當做的。

S.FORM: magalpug. papatagabalaiq a' tunux su' ru pinsibaqan ga papaqasun su'.
magalpog. papatagabalaiq a' tonox so' ro pinsibaqan ga papaqason so'.
S.TRANSL: 10.你會成為明智的人，而知識會使你歡愉。 箴言第二章第一節到第十節-

S.FORM: mayrinax ga siniralu' nku' kumal cu' kai' na' squliq. matu'uwal ga siniralu' nku' Itaal i' Tabilas. ani ini packa' ku' sinraluan ga macka' 'i' Itaal i' Tabilas kahbag. ralu' nku' inuwahan na' mayrinax ru matu'uwal. tiku nanabakis nku' Tabilas ga ini nha baqibaqi cuqaang la.

mayrinax ga siniralo' nko' komal co' kai' na' sqoliq. mato'owal ga siniralo' nko' Itaal i' Tabilas. ani ini packa' ko' sinraloan ga macka' 'i' Itaal i' Tabilas kahbag. ralo' nko' inowahan na' mayrinax ro mato'owal. tiko nanabakis nko' Tabilas ga ini nha baqibaqi coqaang la.
S.TRANSL: mayrinax是別族（賽考利克）對汶水泰雅人的稱呼，matu’uwal是汶水泰雅人的自稱，儘管稱呼不同，但都是指稱說汶水泰雅語的泰雅族人，mayrinax與matu’uwal名稱真正的由來，老一輩的汶水泰雅族人早已不清楚。

S.FORM: kumal Abisang mha. maki runi ku' Gipun ga siniralu' nha ku' lulyung ga mayri' san niya'. babaw niya' ga rasun nku' Gipun ku' minnakiya i' Babuan cu' Para ka kinahakul ru siraluan nha ku' miniyani i' runi mha mayrinax.

komal Abisang mha. maki roni ko' Gipon ga siniralo' nha ko' lolyong ga mayri' san niya'. babaw niya' ga rason nko' Gipon ko' minnakiya i' Baboan co' Para ka kinahakol ro siraloan nha ko' miniyani i' roni mha mayrinax.
S.TRANSL: 但根據發音人湯元基先生的說法mayri’是汶水泰雅人早期對汶水溪的稱呼，後來被移居到錦水村周邊部落的kinahakul 用來稱呼住在汶水溪旁的圓墩部落的汶水人為mayrinax。

S.FORM: kumal cu' kai' na' matu'uwal ga yani ku' Cinswei i' Tabilas, Paquwa i' Mabawkian ru Cinan i' Mabatuan. siqunun ga kii' mamatu' kabhul cu' rawwiq (Taan Go 2008) .
komal co' kai' na' mato'owal ga yani ko' Cinswei i' Tabilas, Paqowa i' Mabawkian ro Cinan i' Mabatoan. siqonon ga kii' mamato' kabhol co' rawwiq (Taan Go 2008) .
S.TRANSL: 目前說汶水泰雅語的matu’uwal人，分布在錦水村的圓墩部落，八卦村的八卦部落，以第三鄰到第四鄰為主，其次是清安村的大坪部落，人口大約六百人左右（泰安鄉志 2008）。

S.FORM: usaying ku' kakalan nku' tingalangan na' Tabilas. cumakiya i' runi ku' Gipun ga siniralu' niya' ku' Itaal i' tinqalangan na' Tabilas. nabakis na' Itaal i' Tabilas ga ini nha baqibaqi' cuqaang ku' inuwahan nku' ralu' ka hani. qutux kakalan ga Bunsuy san nha, muwah ku' Gipun la ga asi niya' pagalagani cku' i' yani 'i' ralu cunga'.

osaying ko' kakalan nko' tingalangan na' Tabilas. comakiya i' roni ko' Gipon ga siniralo' niya' ko' Itaal i' tinqalangan na' Tabilas. nabakis na' Itaal i' Tabilas ga ini nha baqibaqi' coqaang ko' inowahan nko' ralo' ka hani. qotox kakalan ga Bonsoy san nha, mowah ko' Gipon la ga asi niya' pagalagani cko' i' yani 'i' ralo conga'.
S.TRANSL: 圓墩部落有兩種說法，日據時代官方以泰雅語Tabilas的部落名稱稱之，但部落耆老對這樣的說法早已不知其命名的意義和由來，另外一種說法為Bunsuy，日本官方延用之，

S.FORM: muwah la ku' Sebu na' Tuya' la ga asi niya' pagalagani cku' ralu cunga' lawwiy. kiya' ku' kai' ka mha Bunsuy ga kai' na' siputu' ru maymuwang ku' qusiya' mha ku' usalan na' kai' niya'.
mowah la ko' Sebo na' Toya' la ga asi niya' pagalagani cko' ralo conga' lawwiy. kiya' ko' kai' ka mha Bonsoy ga kai' na' sipoto' ro maymowang ko' qosiya' mha ko' osalan na' kai' niya'.
S.TRANSL: 國民政府遷臺仍繼續用「汶水」為本地地名，有此一說，Bunsuy是客家話，是指混濁的水的意思。

S.FORM: kiya' i' tinqalangan na' Tabilas ka Itaal ga kii' tugal kabhul masiqang cu' rawwiq (Taan Go 2008) innuwahan nku' Itaal cunga' ga ini packa kahbag ku' kaikai'. asikina ga kiya' i' Swasiq kinku Sabuluk ka tinqalangan na' Itaal ga ini packa cuqaang ku' kai' ru innuwahan ka riax.

kiya' i' tinqalangan na' Tabilas ka Itaal ga kii' togal kabhol masiqang co' rawwiq (Taan Go 2008) innowahan nko' Itaal conga' ga ini packa kahbag ko' kaikai'. asikina ga kiya' i' Swasiq kinko Sabolok ka tinqalangan na' Itaal ga ini packa coqaang ko' kai' ro innowahan ka riax.
S.TRANSL: 居住在圓墩部落的汶水泰雅族人約三百人左右（泰安鄉志 2008），遷徙的歷史眾說紛紜，但是與住在史瓦細格部落和住在沙埔鹿部落的泰雅族人，就語言及遷徙時間而言是不同的。

S.FORM: usaying ka aqli', usaying ka aqli' ga
osaying ka aqli', osaying ka aqli' ga
tiku qutux ga ukas a' rawiq, tiku qutux ga ukas a' ngangu'
tiko qotox ga okas a' rawiq, tiko qotox ga okas a' ngango'
S.TRANSL: 一隻沒有眼睛，一隻沒有尾巴，

S.FORM: micuwa ka sumsasyaq cuqaang! micuwa ka sumsasyaq cuqaang!
micowa ka somsasyaq coqaang! micowa ka somsasyaq coqaang!

papatasan mu ga "kabalay cu' pinnabubuwan cu' kai' na' Itaal" masina' cu' papatas cu' papacapngan. pinatas ga kaa' papahaynasi' cku' magalpug kabhul. ani humicuwa ku' pinnatas ga hanuan. mapitu cu' buwating ru mapusal cu' riax ga masiqi' kiya'.

papatasan mo ga "kabalay co' pinnabobowan co' kai' na' Itaal" masina' co' papatas co' papacapngan. pinatas ga kaa' papahaynasi' cko' magalpog kabhol. ani homicowa ko' pinnatas ga hanoan. mapito co' bowating ro maposal co' riax ga masiqi' kiya'.
S.TRANSL: 本校舉辦「族語文學創作」徵文比賽。文章字數上限為一千字，形式不拘，截止日期為七月二十日。

S.FORM: kiya' ku' mikimuwah ka Itaal ga papauwah ku' pinatiq mamu ki' Yawi' na' kyusi'. papauwah cku' lcy7917@yahoo.com.tw.
kiya' ko' mikimowah ka Itaal ga papaowah ko' pinatiq mamo ki' Yawi' na' kyosi'. papaowah cko' lcy7917@yahoo.com.tw.
S.TRANSL: 有興趣參加者，請將文稿郵寄lcy7917＠yahoo.com.tw信箱，林成遠老師收。

S.FORM: aring cu' tikay cu ga musa' ci' tumuwang cu' buwinah ru nabakis ci' la ga mabuwinah ci' lawwiy cku' lupung mu.
aring co' tikay co ga mosa' ci' tomowang co' bowinah ro nabakis ci' la ga mabowinah ci' lawwiy cko' lopong mo.
kai' mu na' Itaal ga ini ruu cu' buwinah ru mauba' kahbag ku' abag na' tunux mu.
kai' mo na' Itaal ga ini roo co' bowinah ro maoba' kahbag ko' abag na' tonox mo.
makital cku' ululaqi' ga ini pakababaq.
makital cko' ololaqi' ga ini pakababaq.
masiyaq ku' ululaqi' ru makut cku' nabakis mha minnukahul si' inu'.
masiyaq ko' ololaqi' ro makot cko' nabakis mha minnokahol si' ino'.
S.TRANSL: 笑問客從何處來？ 作者：賀知章

S.FORM: maganaw cku' bih na' hintu' ku' ululaqi'. talan nha ku' qusiya' cku' hintu' ga payux a' taka'. siagal nha cu' batunux ru buun nha ku' taka'. panahuqilun nha ku' taka'.
maganaw cko' bih na' hinto' ko' ololaqi'. talan nha ko' qosiya' cko' hinto' ga payox a' taka'. siagal nha co' batonox ro boon nha ko' taka'. panahoqilon nha ko' taka'.
S.TRANSL: 幾個孩子在水潭邊玩耍，看見水中有許多青蛙，便用石頭去打他們。幾隻青蛙被他們打死了。

S.FORM: matigilata ku' qutux ka taka' la ru kumal mha: "ululaqi' kaa' cami bui' na' batunux la. bali' iwang cu' maganaw cimu ga 'i' cami ga pakakiya' ku' aqih niyam a' kisiliq gi mkiminqaynux cami wiy."
matigilata ko' qotox ka taka' la ro komal mha: "ololaqi' kaa' cami boi' na' batonox la. bali' iwang co' maganaw cimo ga 'i' cami ga pakakiya' ko' aqih niyam a' kisiliq gi mkiminqaynox cami wiy."
S.TRANSL: 這時，一隻青蛙從水中伸出頭來說：「孩子們，請你們不要再打了。這對於你們來說是在做遊戲，而對於我們卻有性命之憂啊。」

S.FORM: kai' ka hani mha maqas ta' ga laxi biqani cku' mawxa ru mngilis ka cuquliq.
kai' ka hani mha maqas ta' ga laxi biqani cko' mawxa ro mngilis ka coqoliq.
S.TRANSL: 【寓意】這是說，不要把自己的快樂建築在別人的痛苦上。 出處：伊索寓言

S.FORM: bayhu i' kiya' ga sibayhu kariariax bubu mha 'i' humanang asi ga kiya' 'i' mingaq a' aqri'. giqas ku' imuwaag asikina ga tiku qaraqarax niya' kahbag ga bali' balaiq cuqaang. muwah cku' baqbaq na' balihun ru tuhung ku' bayhu. tilatu' cubalay ku' bayhu. tupangan mu cu' qihma cu' ruwas ku' baqbaq na' balihun ru tuhung. baqbaq na' babaw na' balihun ga muwah a' bayhu na.

bayho i' kiya' ga sibayho kariariax bobo mha 'i' homanang asi ga kiya' 'i' mingaq a' aqri'. giqas ko' imowaag asikina ga tiko qaraqarax niya' kahbag ga bali' balaiq coqaang. mowah cko' baqbaq na' balihon ro tohong ko' bayho. tilato' cobalay ko' bayho. topangan mo co' qihma co' rowas ko' baqbaq na' balihon ro tohong. baqbaq na' babaw na' balihon ga mowah a' bayho na.
S.TRANSL: 那裡的風，差不多日日有的，呼呼作響，好像虎吼。屋宇雖系新建，構造卻極粗率，風從門窗縫隙中來，分外尖削，把門縫窗隙厚厚地用紙糊了，椽縫中卻仍有透入。

S.FORM: mamati' ku' bayhu ga ani ini kasamsum na ga qalngan mu ku' balihun la. kumingabiyan la ga maqilaap cami la. pungan ku' hanang nku' bayhu ka tilatu' ru mahiyuhiyup ku' qusiya nku' wacilung. tiku kiya' 'i' misasawbih cku' lahulahu ka imuwaag ga yani cubalay ku' papatasan mu. imuwaag mu kahbag ga yani cubalay a' tikay hayhay a' bayhu ku' yani. 'i' biqan mu kariariax ku' tatak nku' qabubing mu ru matawwaw cu' cku' ik nku' pinnaylag ru 'i' mickacka.

mamati' ko' bayho ga ani ini kasamsom na ga qalngan mo ko' balihon la. komingabiyan la ga maqilaap cami la. pongan ko' hanang nko' bayho ka tilato' ro mahiyohiyop ko' qosiya nko' wacilong. tiko kiya' 'i' misasawbih cko' laholaho ka imowaag ga yani cobalay ko' papatasan mo. imowaag mo kahbag ga yani cobalay a' tikay hayhay a' bayho ko' yani. 'i' biqan mo kariariax ko' tatak nko' qabobing mo ro matawwaw co' cko' ik nko' pinnaylag ro 'i' mickacka.
S.TRANSL: 風刮得厲害的時候，天未夜就把大門關上，全家吃畢夜飯即睡入被窩裏，靜聽寒風的怒號，湖水的澎湃。靠山的小後軒，算是我的書齋，在全屋子中風最少的一間，我常把頭上羅宋帽拉得低低地，在洋燈下工作至夜深。

S.FORM: humanang cubalay ku' hayring. hulaqi' ga asiga buwating ru asi niyam ga tuhung. masiqayyung ku' qawlit ru kiya' cku' babaw na' abuabuh 'i' matbabuwinah. kahani la ga ukas a' humanang la ru maqas ci' matiq la. ikuwing nanaq ga matiq ci' cku' babaw na' qabuli kariariax.ini cu pakimqilaap. lumanglung cu ga ikuwing ga kiya' ci' cku' pinatiq mu nanaq cku' ruwas ka hani ru payux cubalay ku' lingnanglung mu.

homanang cobalay ko' hayring. holaqi' ga asiga bowating ro asi niyam ga tohong. masiqayyong ko' qawlit ro kiya' cko' babaw na' aboaboh 'i' matbabowinah. kahani la ga okas a' homanang la ro maqas ci' matiq la. ikowing nanaq ga matiq ci' cko' babaw na' qaboli kariariax.ini co pakimqilaap. lomanglong co ga ikowing ga kiya' ci' cko' pinatiq mo nanaq cko' rowas ka hani ro payox cobalay ko' lingnanglong mo.
S.TRANSL: 松濤如吼，霜月當窗，饑鼠吱吱在承塵上奔竄。我於這種時候深感到蕭瑟的詩趣，常獨自撥劃著爐灰，不肯就睡，就把自己擬諸山水畫中的人物，做種種幽邈的遐想。 作者：夏丐尊

S.FORM: mamaqisug cu' kaal ku' qutux cu' pinkibaqan na' Itaal ga yani cubalay a' kinabalay na' rahwal ka capaang na' waw. matatiputing ga usaying kabhul ru mamaspat cu' rarusa' cuquliq. usaying kabhul ru maymal cu' rusa' cuquliq ku' muwah kariariax. mamaspat ku' mnaqutuqutux 'i' masiukas. matul cuquliq ku' masayusayu 'i' aruwa cu' buwinah. usaying kabhul ru mamaspat cu' rusa' cuquliq ru rarusa cubalay ku' iqat Itaal.

mamaqisog co' kaal ko' qotox co' pinkibaqan na' Itaal ga yani cobalay a' kinabalay na' rahwal ka capaang na' waw. matatipoting ga osaying kabhol ro mamaspat co' rarosa' coqoliq. osaying kabhol ro maymal co' rosa' coqoliq ko' mowah kariariax. mamaspat ko' mnaqotoqotox 'i' masiokas. matol coqoliq ko' masayosayo 'i' arowa co' bowinah. osaying kabhol ro mamaspat co' rosa' coqoliq ro rarosa cobalay ko' iqat Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 九年一貫族語教材的編寫是大規模的編寫工程，先後共動用282員，其中252員為長期參與的人員，也有8員相繼辭世，30員因故異動。282員之中，只有2員為非原住民。

S.FORM: pinnabuwabuwan na' Itaal ga wagan cku' baq cku' kai' niya' nanaq ini ga baq 'i' matas cu' kai' niya' nanaq ka Itaal. lumanglung cu' kakian ru waw nku' matas cu' kai' na' Itaal. matas cu' kai' na' Itaal ka magluglug ga yani cubalay a' capaang na' rahwal ka ayhung na' waw na' yencumingcu.

pinnabowabowan na' Itaal ga wagan cko' baq cko' kai' niya' nanaq ini ga baq 'i' matas co' kai' niya' nanaq ka Itaal. lomanglong co' kakian ro waw nko' matas co' kai' na' Itaal. matas co' kai' na' Itaal ka magloglog ga yani cobalay a' capaang na' rahwal ka ayhong na' waw na' yencomingco.
S.TRANSL: 各編寫組邀集該族精熟族語人士或具教材編輯經驗的人士，兼顧編輯人員的地域與職業的均衡，是原住民族歷史上是難得的龐大編輯群。

S.FORM: humaynas cu' mamaspat na' kinamlapgan (80%) ku' tihkan niya' ka pinnacpung cu' kai' na' Itaal. inha ga yani wiy a' gibaginahun niya' ku' waw na' Itaal. kiya' ku' tikay ka matas cu' kai' na' Ittal. kiya' wiy ku' ini niya' baqi' cuqang ku' kai' niya' nanaq ka Itaal. tiku pinkibaqan cu' kai' na' Itaal ga yani cubalay ku' magluglug 'i' maknamatimati 'i' matas cu' kai' na'Itaal. kumangalgalaying 'i' tihkan ku' kai' na' yencumingcu.

homaynas co' mamaspat na' kinamlapgan (80%) ko' tihkan niya' ka pinnacpong co' kai' na' Itaal. inha ga yani wiy a' gibaginahon niya' ko' waw na' Itaal. kiya' ko' tikay ka matas co' kai' na' Ittal. kiya' wiy ko' ini niya' baqi' coqang ko' kai' niya' nanaq ka Itaal. tiko pinkibaqan co' kai' na' Itaal ga yani cobalay ko' magloglog 'i' maknamatimati 'i' matas co' kai' na'Itaal. komangalgalaying 'i' tihkan ko' kai' na' yencomingco.
S.TRANSL: 80％以上均為族語能力認證合格者，也是族語復振工作的菁英，有些小族語言的編寫人員，甚至是該族尚能使用流利族語的僅存人士。這些編輯群努力編寫而成的族語教材，當可充分呈現當今原住民族語的水準。

S.FORM: maspatul' cu' kaal ka qamisan ka tikay ga musa' ci' papacpung cu' papatgatawki' na' Itaal. tihkan mi' la ga papausalun cu' niya' i' Tupancun 'i' matgatawki'. tiku Tupancun ka capang na' ralu' ga Tuwapal. kiya' i' Taitung Keng, Talen Go. ka capaang na' tatuhi' cubalay ka tinqalangan na' Itaal.

maspatol' co' kaal ka qamisan ka tikay ga mosa' ci' papacpong co' papatgatawki' na' Itaal. tihkan mi' la ga papaosalon co' niya' i' Topancon 'i' matgatawki'. tiko Topancon ka capang na' ralo' ga Towapal. kiya' i' Taitong Keng, Talen Go. ka capaang na' tatohi' cobalay ka tinqalangan na' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 四十年初秋，我參加山地行政特考，錄取後分發到土板村做村幹事。土板村舊名土娃巴勒，是臺東縣達仁鄉最偏遠的原住民部落。

S.FORM: kahbag ku' qutux cu tinqalangan ka yani ga tugal kabhul msiqaag cu' babuan. Paywan kahbag. lalingay niya' ga matatawkun ku' ragragiyax ru ibabawiq. ukas a' raniq ru maicug kahbag ku' cuquliq 'i' musa' i' kiya'.

kahbag ko' qotox co tinqalangan ka yani ga togal kabhol msiqaag co' baboan. Paywan kahbag. lalingay niya' ga matatawkon ko' ragragiyax ro ibabawiq. okas a' raniq ro maicog kahbag ko' coqoliq 'i' mosa' i' kiya'.
S.TRANSL: 全村三百多戶，都是排灣族原住民；四周高山重疊，交通阻梗一般人都視為畏途。

S.FORM: mapanga' ci cu' tawkan ru aqih a' kisiliq mu 'i' musa' 'i' mtawwaw i' kiya'.
mapanga' ci co' tawkan ro aqih a' kisiliq mo 'i' mosa' 'i' mtawwaw i' kiya'.
S.TRANSL: 我背上行囊，懷著忐忑的心情，前去到職。 作者：陳英雄

S.FORM: mamatu'. 'i' kuwing ga Yaba' Uyux Kaal; iqat cu payu' cu' kisliq. cimu ka kinabahan ni' Yakel ga ini cimu patukari' na.
mamato'. 'i' kowing ga Yaba' Uyox Kaal; iqat co payo' co' kisliq. cimo ka kinabahan ni' Yakel ga ini cimo patokari' na.
S.TRANSL: 6「我是上主；我不改變。所以你們這些雅各的後代還沒有完全迷失。

S.FORM: mapitu'. macka cimu cku' nanabakis mamu cunga'. aring cunga' ga mitatuhi cimu cku' gaga mu. ini cimu glug cku' gaga mu. i' cimu ga psikura ki' kuwing. kuwing ga papsikura cu ki' cimu wiy. asiki na ga maqut cimu mha: "asiki humicuwa cami ga yani a' papsikura cami ki' isu'?"

mapito'. macka cimo cko' nanabakis mamo conga'. aring conga' ga mitatohi cimo cko' gaga mo. ini cimo glog cko' gaga mo. i' cimo ga psikora ki' kowing. kowing ga papsikora co ki' cimo wiy. asiki na ga maqot cimo mha: "asiki homicowa cami ga yani a' papsikora cami ki' iso'?"
S.TRANSL: 7跟你們的祖宗一樣，你們一直偏離我的法律，沒有遵守。你們要轉向我，我就轉向你們。可是你們問：『我們該做甚麼才算轉向你呢？』

S.FORM: mamaspat. paqucay mi' cimu: cuquliq ga balaiq ku' makaiwang cu' Utux 'i' Kaal quw? aqih ga. asiki na ga pakiwangun cu mamu. maqut cimu mha: "humicuwa cami 'i' makaiwang 'i' isu?" kumal cu mha: qutux ku' sipagamlumluh rutatubun ka wawwaw ga sipakaiwang niyam 'i' isu'.

mamaspat. paqocay mi' cimo: coqoliq ga balaiq ko' makaiwang co' Utox 'i' Kaal qow? aqih ga. asiki na ga pakiwangon co mamo. maqot cimo mha: "homicowa cami 'i' makaiwang 'i' iso?" komal co mha: qotox ko' sipagamlomloh rotatobon ka wawwaw ga sipakaiwang niyam 'i' iso'.
S.TRANSL: 8我問你們：人可以欺騙上帝嗎？當然不可以！可是你們欺騙了我。你們 問：『我們怎樣欺騙你呢？』我說，就是在該獻的十分之一和祭物上欺騙了我。

S.FORM: mamaqisug. kasangaun cimu kahabag gi pakiwangun cu mamu kahbag.
mamaqisog. kasangaon cimo kahabag gi pakiwangon co mamo kahbag.
S.TRANSL: 9詛咒要臨到你們所有的人，因為全國都在欺騙我。

S.FORM: magalpug. 'i' cimu ga magalpug cu' qun ga asiki sibiq mamu kahahag cku' kakian ni' Yaba' Utux kaal. cku' kakian ni' Yaba' Utux Kaal. naki makiya a' balaiq na' naniqun cku' kakian ni' Yaba' Utux Kaal. 'i' kuwing ga capaang na' Yaba' Utux Kaal-magalaying cku' tawtawki' kahbag. talami' pisa? tatalan mamu 'i' kuwing 'i' gumawah cku' balihun i' babaw na' kaal. kahbag ka balaiq na' wawwaw ga babiq cimu kahbag.

magalpog. 'i' cimo ga magalpog co' qon ga asiki sibiq mamo kahahag cko' kakian ni' Yaba' Utox kaal. cko' kakian ni' Yaba' Utox Kaal. naki makiya a' balaiq na' naniqon cko' kakian ni' Yaba' Utox Kaal. 'i' kowing ga capaang na' Yaba' Utox Kaal-magalaying cko' tawtawki' kahbag. talami' pisa? tatalan mamo 'i' kowing 'i' gomawah cko' balihon i' babaw na' kaal. kahbag ka balaiq na' wawwaw ga babiq cimo kahbag.
S.TRANSL: 10你們要把十分之一的全數送到聖殿，使聖殿裏有豐富的食物。我是上主―萬軍的統帥；試試我，你們就會看見我打開天上的窗戶，把各樣好東西豐豐富富地傾倒給你們。

S.FORM: magalpug cu' qun. iqat cu pasiwal 'i' taqaqilan na' kuikui' ku' papinumuwa mamu. tiku patawwun mamu ga pakasiun kahbag a' buway niya'.
magalpog co' qon. iqat co pasiwal 'i' taqaqilan na' koikoi' ko' papinomowa mamo. tiko patawwon mamo ga pakasion kahbag a' boway niya'.
S.TRANSL: 11我不容許昆蟲毀壞你們的農作物,你們的葡萄樹將結滿葡萄。

S.FORM: magalpug cu' rusa'. masiki i' kiya' la ga, kumal kahbag ku' makababaw na' rawq mha pakabalaiq ku' kinqaynux mamu kahbag. tiku rawq mamu ga balaiq 'i' tumimuwaag (kabalayan cu imuwaag) cku' kakian mamu.

magalpog co' rosa'. masiki i' kiya' la ga, komal kahbag ko' makababaw na' rawq mha pakabalaiq ko' kinqaynox mamo kahbag. tiko rawq mamo ga balaiq 'i' tomimowaag (kabalayan co imowaag) cko' kakian mamo.
S.TRANSL: 12那時，各國的人要說妳們是幸福的，因為你們的土地將是可以安居樂業的地方。 拉基書第三章第六節到第十節

S.FORM: capaang na' ralu' nku' Paqwali' ga Mabawkian. 'i' yani 'i' sinraruan nku' matu'uwal ga Mabawkian ru tumuwang la ku' siputu' ru sinraruan niya' mha Paqwali'.
capaang na' ralo' nko' Paqwali' ga Mabawkian. 'i' yani 'i' sinraroan nko' mato'owal ga Mabawkian ro tomowang la ko' sipoto' ro sinraroan niya' mha Paqwali'.
S.TRANSL: 八卦真正的名稱為Mabawkian,是汶水泰雅人最早稱的名字，被後來的客家人稱為Paqwali’，

S.FORM: sinnubilan nku' nanabakis na' Mabawkian ga kumal mha kiya' ku' qutux ka kahuniq ka kithu' ru payux a' qarax niya' ru kihma' a' abag niya'. kiya' cubalay cku' iglag ru talan kahbag ku' rawrawq. yani ku' balaiq cubalay i' kakian na' qwali'. tiku Itaal i' kiya' ga yani ku' san nha mha balaiq i' qubuwaan cu' qwali'. sincen i' Mabawkian ga Paquwa Sung.

sinnobilan nko' nanabakis na' Mabawkian ga komal mha kiya' ko' qotox ka kahoniq ka kitho' ro payox a' qarax niya' ro kihma' a' abag niya'. kiya' cobalay cko' iglag ro talan kahbag ko' rawrawq. yani ko' balaiq cobalay i' kakian na' qwali'. tiko Itaal i' kiya' ga yani ko' san nha mha balaiq i' qobowaan co' qwali'. sincen i' Mabawkian ga Paqowa Song.
S.TRANSL: 傳說八卦山有一棵高大的樹，枝幹樹葉茂密，視野廣闊，是適合老鷹居住的好環境而得此名，當地的泰雅族人以此為捕獵老鷹的獵場。

S.FORM: tinqalangan i' Mabawkian ga kabhul ru mapitu kimnamalapgan ru msiqang ku' Itaal. (Taian go 2008)
tinqalangan i' Mabawkian ga kabhol ro mapito kimnamalapgan ro msiqang ko' Itaal. (Taian go 2008)
S.TRANSL: 行政隸屬八卦村，部落人口數170人（泰安鄉志2008）。

S.FORM: tinqalangan na' Mabawkian ka qutux cu' imuwaag ga matkaqutux cu' imuwaag ga Lin, Tien, Co, Hwang ru Li. kiya' tikay ku' tumuwang cku' yung rin. maimag Itaal ru siputu ku' tinqalangan ka yani.
tinqalangan na' Mabawkian ka qotox co' imowaag ga matkaqotox co' imowaag ga Lin, Tien, Co, Hwang ro Li. kiya' tikay ko' tomowang cko' yong rin. maimag Itaal ro sipoto ko' tinqalangan ka yani.
S.TRANSL: Mabawkian部落的家族結構以田、林、黃、李、周等姓氏為主，少部分客家族群居住在第四鄰，是一個漢原混居的部落。

S.FORM: capaang na' ralu nku' Mabatu'an ga, Matuan salun na' siputu'. ralu' na' siputu' ga Matuan. Cinan cun i' Mabawtuan. tinqalangan i' Mabatu'an ga kabhul ru maymal kimnamalapgan ru msiqang ku' Itaal. (Taian go 2008) tinqalangan nku' Mabatu'an ga makasawbih kina' siputu'. tinqalangan ka yani ga maimag kina' tuya' ru siputu' ru siputu' ru asi paglug ku' gaga nha la.

capaang na' ralo nko' Mabato'an ga, Matoan salon na' sipoto'. ralo' na' sipoto' ga Matoan. Cinan con i' Mabawtoan. tinqalangan i' Mabato'an ga kabhol ro maymal kimnamalapgan ro msiqang ko' Itaal. (Taian go 2008) tinqalangan nko' Mabato'an ga makasawbih kina' sipoto'. tinqalangan ka yani ga maimag kina' toya' ro sipoto' ro sipoto' ro asi paglog ko' gaga nha la.
S.TRANSL: 傳統部落稱之為Mabatu’an，漢名稱為馬都安，行政區隸屬清安村大坪部落，部落人口數150人（泰安鄉志2008）。部落鄰近漢族客籍居住地，部落日久接觸漢族文化。

S.FORM: linanglung cunga' ga minukahul i' yahu' nku' mayri' ka lulyung ku' Mabatu'an ru araruwa 'i' makarakiyas ru masiki' i' Mabatu'an.Cinswei i' Tabilas, Paqwali' Mabawkian ru Cinan i' Mabatu'an ga macka 'i' kumal cu' kai' na' matu'uwal kahbag.

linanglong conga' ga minokahol i' yaho' nko' mayri' ka lolyong ko' Mabato'an ro ararowa 'i' makarakiyas ro masiki' i' Mabato'an.Cinswei i' Tabilas, Paqwali' Mabawkian ro Cinan i' Mabato'an ga macka 'i' komal co' kai' na' mato'owal kahbag.
S.TRANSL: 遠早的記憶遷史中，Mabatu’an的居民據述遠自後龍溪流域下游一帶逐漸往上游移代遷徙，與錦水村的圓墩部落及八卦村的八卦部落同為汶水群，語言上都說汶水語。

S.FORM: mital cu' pahpah na' qaym na' lahulahu ku' mamaliku.
mital co' pahpah na' qaym na' laholaho ko' mamaliko.
tiku kiya' cku' ukas a' nanananu ka rawq ka pahpah na' qaym na' lahulahu.
tiko kiya' cko' okas a' nananano ka rawq ka pahpah na' qaym na' laholaho.
kasasanan ga makapahpah cu' balaiq 'i' sawkan ru balaiq 'i' talan.
kasasanan ga makapahpah co' balaiq 'i' sawkan ro balaiq 'i' talan.
ani asi angagi' ga araruwa 'i' balaiq 'i' talan.
ani asi angagi' ga ararowa 'i' balaiq 'i' talan.
pahpah na' qaym pahpah na' qaym matanah ka pahpah na' qaym.
pahpah na' qaym pahpah na' qaym matanah ka pahpah na' qaym.
S.TRANSL: 桃花 桃花 紅桃花，

S.FORM: kiya' cku' ukas a' nanunanu ka rawq ku' pahpah na' qaym.
kiya' cko' okas a' nanonano ka rawq ko' pahpah na' qaym.

Leianhkuo mapusal kinkabhul ru mapitu' cu' kaal (2007) kaal ru mamqisug (9) buwating ru magalpug cu' tugal (13) riax sumiwal yencumingcu Kenri' na' kai'. gumlug cku' gaga na' Leianhkuo. kumal cku' yencumingcu ru kahbag ka pinnababutuan na' Itaal ga macka kahbag ku' Kenri' nha. tiku rawrawq ga, yani ku' magalpug ka cinpung niya' ka pinatiq. asiki ini apxi cu' kai' cuqaang ku' yencumingcu mha pagay cku' rawrawq niya'.

Leianhkoo maposal kinkabhol ro mapito' co' kaal (2007) kaal ro mamqisog (9) bowating ro magalpog co' togal (13) riax somiwal yencomingco Kenri' na' kai'. gomlog cko' gaga na' Leianhkoo. komal cko' yencomingco ro kahbag ka pinnababotoan na' Itaal ga macka kahbag ko' Kenri' nha. tiko rawrawq ga, yani ko' magalpog ka cinpong niya' ka pinatiq. asiki ini apxi co' kai' coqaang ko' yencomingco mha pagay cko' rawrawq niya'.
S.TRANSL: 聯合國大會2007年9月13日通過原住民族權利宣言，秉承《聯合國憲章》的宗旨和原則，申明原住民族與所有其他民族平等，關於土地，第10條明文規定，不得強迫原住民族遷離其土地或領土。

S.FORM: ini pasasiwal 'i' makal cku' yencumingcu ru ini ga ini nabablayqi' 'i' pasayu ru bali baqun kii' makibabuwinah lawwiy cku' kakian niya' ga asiki ini papgiaygi'.
ini pasasiwal 'i' makal cko' yencomingco ro ini ga ini nabablayqi' 'i' pasayo ro bali baqon kii' makibabowinah lawwiy cko' kakian niya' ga asiki ini papgiaygi'.
S.TRANSL: 如果未事先獲得有關原住民族的自由知情同意和商定公正和公平的賠償，並在可能時提供返回的選擇，則不得進行遷離。

S.FORM: tagabutubutu' 'i' musa' i' imuwaag ru patkariun niya' ka ausa' niya'.
tagabotoboto' 'i' mosa' i' imowaag ro patkarion niya' ka aosa' niya'.
S.TRANSL: 獨自回家時又迷失了方向

S.FORM: qanarux cubalay ru ayhung i' wahan ku' raniq ka hani ga.
qanarox cobalay ro ayhong i' wahan ko' raniq ka hani ga.

S.FORM: tiku raniq ka aqih i' ubuwinahan ani asi hakagi' ga araruwa i' tatuhi.
tiko raniq ka aqih i' obowinahan ani asi hakagi' ga ararowa i' tatohi.
S.TRANSL: 一條禁止迴轉的單行道 越走越遠

S.FORM: sinakux cu' iqat laluwan la ku' pinaskakaruan ka kinakian cunga'.
sinakox co' iqat lalowan la ko' pinaskakaroan ka kinakian conga'.

S.FORM: kii' yani ku' Banggo niya' cunga'.
kii' yani ko' Banggo niya' conga'.
kii ini packa ku' qalimu na' Itaal .
kii ini packa ko' qalimo na' Itaal .
linanglung mu cku' ququququng ga iyaik cubalay.
linanglong mo cko' qoqoqoqong ga iyaik cobalay.
S.TRANSL: 我在記憶的角落裡陷得太深

S.FORM: magukiki' ga kiya' 'i' siqubuwang kahabag ka sugagay na' raniq ga pinababutuan cu' ini packa' ka qarax asiga matatukayran ru matababuwinah ku' linanglung mu.
magokiki' ga kiya' 'i' siqobowang kahabag ka sogagay na' raniq ga pinababotoan co' ini packa' ka qarax asiga matatokayran ro matababowinah ko' linanglong mo.

matababowinah ro aqih 'i longolongon ko' babaw na' rawq ka hani.
maturakis ka pinnaglag ga kiya' 'i' tumatap i' pug nanaq.
matorakis ka pinnaglag ga kiya' 'i' tomatap i' pog nanaq.
makimayhul ci' cubalay cku' balaiq ka ausa' i' imuwaag quw?
makimayhol ci' cobalay cko' balaiq ka aosa' i' imowaag qow?
ini ga manabuwibuwi kumyum cu' qutux cu' raniq ka ausa' i' imuwaag.
ini ga manabowibowi komyom co' qotox co' raniq ka aosa' i' imowaag.

ita' ga asiki manababowinah 'i' mosa' cko' aosalan ta'.

S.FORM: tiku sayhu na' cuquliq ga muwah 'i' cumyuk cu' kai'. tawki' na' kanayril asi niya' ga manahuqil ku' mauba' ka asiga hulaqi' ka wagi'. tiku hani la ga asi niya' ga, 'i' hiya 'a capaang na' magbatunux na' mukurakis. humakay cku' bih nku' qariwal mha: "kal cu, qariwal, nababalaiq ci' kumal! makababaw na' rawq ka mukurakis ga ima' ku' magbatunux cubalay? kal cu mha ima' ku ralu' niya'?"

tiko sayho na' coqoliq ga mowah 'i' comyok co' kai'. tawki' na' kanayril asi niya' ga manahoqil ko' maoba' ka asiga holaqi' ka wagi'. tiko hani la ga asi niya' ga, 'i' hiya 'a capaang na' magbatonox na' mokorakis. homakay cko' bih nko' qariwal mha: "kal co, qariwal, nababalaiq ci' komal! makababaw na' rawq ka mokorakis ga ima' ko' magbatonox cobalay? kal co mha ima' ko ralo' niya'?"
S.TRANSL: 那個僕人回來覆命後，王后以為白雪公主已經死了，這下，她一定是全國最漂亮的女人了，她走到魔鏡面前說：「告訴我，鏡子，告訴我實話！全國所有的女人誰最漂亮？告訴我她是誰？」

S.FORM: kumal ku' qariwl mha: "isu' ga, tawki' na' kanayril!" isu' ku' magbatunux cubalay cku' babaw na' rawq ka hani. asikina ga kiya' cku' ragiyax i' kiya'. kiya' cku' mamawasiq ka ik na kahuykahuy. kiya' ku imuwaag ka kinabalay nku' mapitu ka singusingut. kiya' 'i' tulqin kiya' ku mauba' ka asiga hulaqi' ka wagi'. apaw wala, tawki' na kanayril! 'i' hiya' a' magbatunux ni' isu'.

komal ko' qariwl mha: "iso' ga, tawki' na' kanayril!" iso' ko' magbatonox cobalay cko' babaw na' rawq ka hani. asikina ga kiya' cko' ragiyax i' kiya'. kiya' cko' mamawasiq ka ik na kahoykahoy. kiya' ko imowaag ka kinabalay nko' mapito ka singosingot. kiya' 'i' tolqin kiya' ko maoba' ka asiga holaqi' ka wagi'. apaw wala, tawki' na kanayril! 'i' hiya' a' magbatonox ni' iso'.
S.TRANSL: 鏡子回答說：「是你，王后！你是這塊地方最漂亮的女人，但是在山的那一邊，在那綠色的樹蔭下，有七個小矮人建造的小房屋，白雪公主就躲藏在那裡，哎呀，王后！她比你更漂亮。」

S.FORM: pungan nku' tawki' na' kanayril ga mnakuh cubalay la. aqih gi baqun niya' ku' qariwal mha ini pakaiwang 'i' kumal cubalay. kii' cubalay i' yani ku' sayhu na' Itaal ku' makaiwang 'i' hiya'. kisliq niya' mha 'i' hiya ga ini siwal mha 'i' hiya' a' capaang na' magbatunux ka kiya' 'i' mqaynux cku' babaw na' rawq.

pongan nko' tawki' na' kanayril ga mnakoh cobalay la. aqih gi baqon niya' ko' qariwal mha ini pakaiwang 'i' komal cobalay. kii' cobalay i' yani ko' sayho na' Itaal ko' makaiwang 'i' hiya'. kisliq niya' mha 'i' hiya ga ini siwal mha 'i' hiya' a' capaang na' magbatonox ka kiya' 'i' mqaynox cko' babaw na' rawq.
S.TRANSL: 王后聽了大吃一驚，因為她知道這面鏡子是從不說假話的，一定是那僕人蒙騙了她，她決不能容忍有任何比她更漂亮的人活在這個世上。 出處：格林童話

S.FORM: kumal ku' cuquliq mha kaa' nubuwag cu' quwau la. kumal ku' kumal ga, imagal cu' kal la mha ani ima' ga ukas a' minnital 'i' kuwing 'i' mabusinuk. aqih gi ini cu niya' tali' 'i' mabusinuk ru 'i' hiya nanaq ku' manakhing 'i' mataku 'i' abusinuk la.

komal ko' coqoliq mha kaa' nobowag co' qowao la. komal ko' komal ga, imagal co' kal la mha ani ima' ga okas a' minnital 'i' kowing 'i' mabosinok. aqih gi ini co niya' tali' 'i' mabosinok ro 'i' hiya nanaq ko' manakhing 'i' matako 'i' abosinok la.
S.TRANSL: 別人勸我戒酒，勸歸勸，但勸了五年誰也沒見我醉過，因為沒等我醉他就先醉倒了。

S.FORM: iqat cu ini nubuwag ka Itaal. ka hani ga iaqt cubalay. cunga' ga yani cubalay. babaw niya' la ga aqih gi aqih a' hihihi' mu. siri' cu na' quwau.
iqat co ini nobowag ka Itaal. ka hani ga iaqt cobalay. conga' ga yani cobalay. babaw niya' la ga aqih gi aqih a' hihihi' mo. siri' co na' qowao.
S.TRANSL: 我不是戒酒主義者，至少現在不是。以前曾經是的，後來因為體質弱，我沒能抵擋住酒力。 出處：馬庫斯克拉克

S.FORM: maki tatuhi' ru asi lilaluwi' ku' Taiwan. yani cubalay ku' balaiq mu ka kakian. capaang mu ka riax ga kiya' cku' Taiwan 'i' mahikum la. tiku balaiq nku' kinqaynux mu ga kiya' i' kiya' kahbag. balaiq mu 'i' tangaan ku' babawiq ka ragragiyax. mital cku' iyaik ru rahwal ka uqu'. humakay cku' rahwal ka babaw na' baru' ku' parnah.

maki tatohi' ro asi lilalowi' ko' Taiwan. yani cobalay ko' balaiq mo ka kakian. capaang mo ka riax ga kiya' cko' Taiwan 'i' mahikom la. tiko balaiq nko' kinqaynox mo ga kiya' i' kiya' kahbag. balaiq mo 'i' tangaan ko' babawiq ka ragragiyax. mital cko' iyaik ro rahwal ka oqo'. homakay cko' rahwal ka babaw na' baro' ko' parnah.
S.TRANSL: 遙遠的臺灣是我所喜愛的地方。我最好的年月是在該島上消磨了的，我的生活興趣也集中於該處。我喜歡仰望它的巍峨的山峯，俯視它的深廣的溪壑，泛舟於它的波濤洶湧的海上。

S.FORM: balaiq mu ku' magalawa na' Itaal—Tuya', Panah ru Itaal— mapusal ci cu' kaal 'i' qumlag 'i' maqaynux ki' nha. kumal nku' gagagaga ni' Yesu i' babaw na' kaal. aqih gi psibaq cku' kai' nku' Utux i' babaw na' kaal. humaynas ci cu' magalpug cu' kabhul. anana asi mu 'i' laxi kiya' ku' ginisuna mu nanaq.

balaiq mo ko' magalawa na' Itaal—Toya', Panah ro Itaal— maposal ci co' kaal 'i' qomlag 'i' maqaynox ki' nha. komal nko' gagagaga ni' Yeso i' babaw na' kaal. aqih gi psibaq cko' kai' nko' Utox i' babaw na' kaal. homaynas ci co' magalpog co' kabhol. anana asi mo 'i' laxi kiya' ko' ginisona mo nanaq.
S.TRANSL: 我喜愛它的黑皮膚的人民—漢人、平埔和生番—我在他們中間走了20年，宣傳耶穌的福音。為了要以福音教導他們，我不止一千次，情願犧牲我的生命。

S.FORM: ini lapgi' na' cuquliq na ku' pinatiq mu ga. mausa' cu lawwiy 'i' tatuhi ka auwah na' wagi'. ulunk cu psibaqan ci cu' kai' na' Utux. babaw niya' la ga taihuk ci' cku' Taipingyang ka balaiq na' Taiwan ka imuwaag.

ini lapgi' na' coqoliq na ko' pinatiq mo ga. maosa' co lawwiy 'i' tatohi ka aowah na' wagi'. olonk co psibaqan ci co' kai' na' Utox. babaw niya' la ga taihok ci' cko' Taipingyang ka balaiq na' Taiwan ka imowaag.
S.TRANSL: 在我所寫的文章為人閱讀以前，我將再往遠東，蒙上帝的指導，再到太平洋那邊我所愛的臺灣之家。

S.FORM: lumanglung cu mha maki' kiya' 'i' humikum cku' masiqang na' riax. manaqru' ci matawwaw cku' Utux ka riax la ga. pakakiya' ci' cku' tehkan na' hanang na' baru' i' Taiwan. kiya' ci' ik nku' babuwiqa ka mawiwi' 'i' kumyum cku' capaang na' kakian mu kariariax la.

lomanglong co mha maki' kiya' 'i' homikom cko' masiqang na' riax. manaqro' ci matawwaw cko' Utox ka riax la ga. pakakiya' ci' cko' tehkan na' hanang na' baro' i' Taiwan. kiya' ci' ik nko' babowiqa ka mawiwi' 'i' komyom cko' capaang na' kakian mo kariariax la.
S.TRANSL: 我希望在那裡消磨我的餘年，我為主服務的時日完了之後，我將在臺灣的海浪之聲所及之處，在搖擺的竹蔭下得一 永眠之所。 作者：馬偕

S.FORM: tiku aruwa' ka ini kaingaasug ga, kiya' ku' qutux ka rawing ka minuwah i' Amerika ga balaiq a' nanubuwag niya'. muwah 'i' maqut cku' tinqalangan na' Itaal la ga. asi pagalawa' ku' raqinas niya' ru kumal mha:"magalgay ti' malax cu' quwau kahbag la!" tiku matqaqutux ka qalang na' Itaal ga macka kahbag 'i' manubuwag ku' kai' niya' ru asi pkahtu' lawiy ku' linanglung niya' ka aqih."manubuwag su' lawwiy ga, papatgapawng ku' qalang na' Itaal kahbag." kumal mha.

tiko arowa' ka ini kaingaasog ga, kiya' ko' qotox ka rawing ka minowah i' Amerika ga balaiq a' nanobowag niya'. mowah 'i' maqot cko' tinqalangan na' Itaal la ga. asi pagalawa' ko' raqinas niya' ro komal mha:"magalgay ti' malax co' qowao kahbag la!" tiko matqaqotox ka qalang na' Itaal ga macka kahbag 'i' manobowag ko' kai' niya' ro asi pkahto' lawiy ko' linanglong niya' ka aqih."manobowag so' lawwiy ga, papatgapawng ko' qalang na' Itaal kahbag." komal mha.
S.TRANSL: 前不久，一位酒量不錯的外國友人，在拜訪幾個山地部落之後，神精淒然嚴肅地告訴我說：「我們一起戒酒吧！」，原來，那幾處山地部落酗酒的嚴重現象，引起他很深的罪惡感。「再喝下去，原住民將消滅自己的部落。」他說。

S.FORM: siwalan ru sigualu' mu ku' kahabag. tiku Itaal ga ukas la ku' rawrawq, pinnawian ru sinuwawan. masapiq ru mamati 'i' manubuwag ka Taiawnisos. yani cubalay a' burukan niya' ku' linanglung cku' ulaqi' ka kiya' cku' rawq 'i' manubuwag ka balaiq a' qalimu.

siwalan ro sigoalo' mo ko' kahabag. tiko Itaal ga okas la ko' rawrawq, pinnawian ro sinowawan. masapiq ro mamati 'i' manobowag ka Taiawnisos. yani cobalay a' borokan niya' ko' linanglong cko' olaqi' ka kiya' cko' rawq 'i' manobowag ka balaiq a' qalimo.
S.TRANSL: 我同意也同情他的感受，山地社會在失去了它的田園、藝術和宗教之後，戴奧尼索斯墮落的狂醉形式，的確正在腐蝕我童年記憶中田園飲酒的美麗圖像。

S.FORM: asikina ga, tiku baqun mu ka quwau na' Utux. sinnwagun mu cubalay cu' mamati manubuwag ku' Itaal kahbag. kiya' ku' payux ka ini baqi a' kakalan. bali yani nanak ku' malax cu' quwau la ga balaiq 'i' sikal la. kahi ci' kumal mha: mahananu ga ingasug ga manahaliq 'i' manubawag cu' qutux pisa'. buq na' rawiq ga makiya' cku' kakulu' na' rawiq 'i' masbabuwinah.

asikina ga, tiko baqon mo ka qowao na' Utox. sinnwagon mo cobalay co' mamati manobowag ko' Itaal kahbag. kiya' ko' payox ka ini baqi a' kakalan. bali yani nanak ko' malax co' qowao la ga balaiq 'i' sikal la. kahi ci' komal mha: mahanano ga ingasog ga manahaliq 'i' manobawag co' qotox pisa'. boq na' rawiq ga makiya' cko' kakolo' na' rawiq 'i' masbabowinah.
S.TRANSL: 不過，基於上述我對酒神的理解，我仍然相信山地酗酒的現象，有它複雜、深刻的因素，不是「戒酒」一端便可以解決的。我因此建議：也許我們可以「久久酒一次」吧，淚水不禁在眼眶中徘徊…。 作者：孫大川

S.FORM: tugal cu' qutux: macka', cimu ga asiki pungan mamu cu' kai' ku' mamaliku mamu. ini pakararaniq ku' mamaliku mamu ga mausa' 'i' gumlug 'i' cimu gi kiya' ku' balaiq na' inlalungalungan mamu. laxi ku' payux a' kaikai'.

togal co' qotox: macka', cimo ga asiki pongan mamo co' kai' ko' mamaliko mamo. ini pakararaniq ko' mamaliko mamo ga maosa' 'i' gomlog 'i' cimo gi kiya' ko' balaiq na' inlalongalongan mamo. laxi ko' payox a' kaikai'.
S.TRANSL: 3:1 同樣，作妻子的，你們也應該順服自己的丈夫，好使沒有接受真道的丈夫能因你們的好品行受感化。你們用不著多說話，

S.FORM: tugal cu' usaying: inha ga kital cku' kinmauba mamu ru lawkah ku' kisliq mamu.
togal co' osaying: inha ga kital cko' kinmaoba mamo ro lawkah ko' kisliq mamo.
S.TRANSL: 3:2 因為他們會看見你們的純潔和端莊的品行。

S.FORM: tugal cu' tugal: cimu ga laxi ku' cumawm cuqang cu' tapung ru matababalaiq cuqang cu' abag na' tunux. kumui' cu' kaka cuqang ru matababalaiq 'i' humilaw cu' siyatu'.
togal co' togal: cimo ga laxi ko' comawm coqang co' tapong ro matababalaiq coqang co' abag na' tonox. komoi' co' kaka coqang ro matababalaiq 'i' homilaw co' siyato'.
S.TRANSL: 3:3 你們不要藉打扮來妝飾自己，不要講究怎樣鬈頭髮，戴甚麼金飾，穿甚麼衣服。

S.FORM: tugal cu' sapat: cimu ga asiki balaiq ku' lalihbun mamu. ini pahahuwi' ku' kinnamahway nku' linanglung mamu. yani cubalay capaang na' balaiq 'i' talan na' Utux.
togal co' sapat: cimo ga asiki balaiq ko' lalihbon mamo. ini pahahowi' ko' kinnamahway nko' linanglong mamo. yani cobalay capaang na' balaiq 'i' talan na' Utox.
S.TRANSL: 3:4 你們應該有內在的美，以那不會衰退的溫柔嫻靜為妝飾；這在上帝眼中是最有價值的。

S.FORM: tugal cu' imagal: cunga' ga umangay cu' lalihbun na' kanayril ku' Utux mha gumlug cu' kai' nku' mamaliku nha nanaq.
togal co' imagal: conga' ga omangay co' lalihbon na' kanayril ko' Utox mha gomlog co' kai' nko' mamaliko nha nanaq.
S.TRANSL: 3:5 因為，從前那些仰望上帝的聖潔婦女也都以服從丈夫來妝飾自己。

S.FORM: tugal cu' mamatu': muwani wiy ku' Sala, pungan niya' ku' kai' nku' Yapolahan mha isu' ku' capaang na' tawki' cubalay. kiya' a' balaiq na' linanglung. ini kaicug cu' ani nanuwan. muwani la ga 'i' cimu ku' ulaqi' ni' Sala la.

togal co' mamato': mowani wiy ko' Sala, pongan niya' ko' kai' nko' Yapolahan mha iso' ko' capaang na' tawki' cobalay. kiya' a' balaiq na' linanglong. ini kaicog co' ani nanowan. mowani la ga 'i' cimo ko' olaqi' ni' Sala la.
S.TRANSL: 3:6 莎拉也是這樣；她服從亞伯拉罕，稱呼他「主人」。你們有好行為，不畏懼甚麼，你們就都是莎拉的女兒了。

S.FORM: tugal cu' mapitu': macka', tiku glug mamu ka mamaliku ga paglug cku' kanayril mamu 'i' maqaynux. asiki sumblaiqun tikay 'i' hiya' aqih gi ini kalawkah a' kisliq niya'. pungan cu' kai' tikay 'i' hiya'. inha ga macka' ki' cimu mausa' 'i' magal cu' kai' nku' Utux ka miq cu' giqas na' ginsuna. muwani la ga. tumubun cimu ga iqat cimu sasiqaqarahan na' nananuwan la.

togal co' mapito': macka', tiko glog mamo ka mamaliko ga paglog cko' kanayril mamo 'i' maqaynox. asiki somblaiqon tikay 'i' hiya' aqih gi ini kalawkah a' kisliq niya'. pongan co' kai' tikay 'i' hiya'. inha ga macka' ki' cimo maosa' 'i' magal co' kai' nko' Utox ka miq co' giqas na' ginsona. mowani la ga. tomobon cimo ga iqat cimo sasiqaqarahan na' nananowan la.
S.TRANSL: 3:7 同樣，作丈夫的，你們跟妻子一同生活，也應該體貼她們在性別上比 較軟弱。要尊重她們，因為她們跟你們一樣都要領受上帝所賜的新生命。 能夠這樣，你們的禱告就不至於受阻礙。 比得前書第三章第ㄧ節到第七節

S.FORM: san na' squliq mha wasiq ga, yani ku' kai' nku' matu'uwal mha wagu. Itaal ga balaiq na' naniqun cubalay. tahkun nha ru paqasiyaan nha na' tilatu' ru siramat nha. makaquwawu ga balaiq cubalay 'i' nubun. asiki makiya cubalay a' wagu mha kahbag ku' Itaal.

san na' sqoliq mha wasiq ga, yani ko' kai' nko' mato'owal mha wago. Itaal ga balaiq na' naniqon cobalay. tahkon nha ro paqasiyaan nha na' tilato' ro siramat nha. makaqowawo ga balaiq cobalay 'i' nobon. asiki makiya cobalay a' wago mha kahbag ko' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: wasiq是泰雅族人（squliq）稱龍癸的名稱，汶水語稱為wagu，泰雅族人食用此植物冷卻後飲用來補充水分，又可以解酒是泰雅族生活中不可或缺的植物。

S.FORM: squliq ga makalahulahu ru humaynas i' Ciyarisan ru umiyax la ga i' Cawasiq la. talan nha ru payux cubalay a' wagu ru pungan nha ku' matu'uwal mha Cawasiq ru payimagun nha ku' ralu' nku' wagu kinku Cawasiq. tiku kiya' i' Cawasiq ka Itaal (squliq) ga kii magalpug cu' mamaqisug kinnakabhul ru maymal cu' mamatu' cu' kaal (1956) kaal ga minkahul i' Nacwang ru muwah i' Cawasiq la.

sqoliq ga makalaholaho ro homaynas i' Ciyarisan ro omiyax la ga i' Cawasiq la. talan nha ro payox cobalay a' wago ro pongan nha ko' mato'owal mha Cawasiq ro payimagon nha ko' ralo' nko' wago kinko Cawasiq. tiko kiya' i' Cawasiq ka Itaal (sqoliq) ga kii magalpog co' mamaqisog kinnakabhol ro maymal co' mamato' co' kaal (1956) kaal ga minkahol i' Nacwang ro mowah i' Cawasiq la.
S.TRANSL: 賽考利克人越過加里山一帶的山區時就是史瓦矽格，發現山中盛長龍癸wasiq的植物，又常聽到汶水人稱過去的龍山為cawasiq，遂混合地名與植物名稱形成今日地名swasiq的由來。目前居住在史’瓦細格部落的居民大約是在1956由南庄一帶，先後遷移過來的族群。

S.FORM: Sapuluk ga yani a' sinnaralu nha cku' magay i' runi ku' Gipun. yani a' sinnaralu nku' matu'uwal maha caquwis ga, masibabanux ku' rawq. tiku qalang i' Sapuluk ka nanabakis ga mamatu kinamalapgan cu' kaal ru msiqaang ga. minukahul i' Nacuwang Lucang ku' nanabakis nha ru muwah 'i' tumuang 'i' runi ru qumalauwap ru maqilaap runi. talan nha banux ku' rawq runi. sinnaralu nha ga quwis.

Sapolok ga yani a' sinnaralo nha cko' magay i' roni ko' Gipon. yani a' sinnaralo nko' mato'owal maha caqowis ga, masibabanox ko' rawq. tiko qalang i' Sapolok ka nanabakis ga mamato kinamalapgan co' kaal ro msiqaang ga. minokahol i' Nacowang Locang ko' nanabakis nha ro mowah 'i' tomoang 'i' roni ro qomalaowap ro maqilaap roni. talan nha banox ko' rawq roni. sinnaralo nha ga qowis.
S.TRANSL: 砂埔鹿部落是台灣光復後的名稱，Matu’wal（汶水泰雅人）稱之為 caquwis，意思是由沙子堆積而成的平坦之地，大約在六十年前來自於南庄鹿場的泰雅族人到此地狩獵，並夜宿於此，見地形平坦而稱之為quwis（賽考利克語） 。

S.FORM: Sapuluk ga kuruma ga siputu' ru kuruma ga Itaal ka tuminuwang. habag tikay ku' Itaal. usaying ka pinnababutuan na' maqyanux ga kii' usaying kabhul masiqang cu rawiq.
Sapolok ga koroma ga sipoto' ro koroma ga Itaal ka tominowang. habag tikay ko' Itaal. osaying ka pinnababotoan na' maqyanox ga kii' osaying kabhol masiqang co rawiq.
S.TRANSL: 砂埔鹿部落除了少部分客家人之外大部分以泰雅族人居多，兩類族群人口約為250人，其中泰雅族以宋、張、陳氏等家族為最多。
汶水人對賽考利克的別稱

S.FORM: mapusal kinnakabhul ru mapitu' cu' kaal
maposal kinnakabhol ro mapito' co' kaal
mauba' ka asiga hulaqi' ka wagi'
maoba' ka asiga holaqi' ka wagi'
magalpug cu' mamaqisug kinnakabhul ru maymal cu' mamatu' cu' kaal
magalpog co' mamaqisog kinnakabhol ro maymal co' mamato' co' kaal

S.TRANSL: 沙子堆積而成的平坦之地
